item.title: Circle Radius Fit for a Cloud of Points
item.description: In this post I explore how to render a .Rmd file directly with blogdown. To play around with it, I wrote a simple R notebook which fits a circle to a cloud of points. Prepare the Notebook library(tidyverse) Generate Circle Data # Dimension of the space. d <- 2 # Number of sample points. N <- 1000 # Radius. R <- 4 # Generate random sample of points (x - axis).
